Title: Prohibits the operation of horse drawn cabs in the city of New York; repealer
Summary: Prohibits the operation of horse drawn cabs in the city of New York; defines the circumstances under which sale or disposal of a horse shall be deemed humane.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting the operation of horse drawn cabs in the city of New York; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
